sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from "react"; import {roundSeparateNumber} from "../../../common/utils"; const ItemTableCurrency = ({asset}) => { const [isOpenDetails, setIsOpenDetails] = useState(false); return ( <> setIsOpenDetails(!isOpenDetails)}> {asset.rank} {asset.name} ${roundSeparateNumber(asset.priceUsd)} ${roundSeparateNumber(asset.marketCapUsd)} ${roundSeparateNumber(asset.vwap24Hr)} ${roundSeparateNumber(asset.supply)} ${roundSeparateNumber(asset.volumeUsd24Hr)} {roundSeparateNumber(asset.changePercent24Hr)}% {isOpenDetails && <> {asset.name} ({asset.symbol}) HIGH AVERAGE data LOW CHANGE } ) } ; export default ItemTableCurrency;
